***

- To use with `.columns`, care is needed: 
    - force full width for columns
    - properly .block other contents

```
:::::: {.r-stack }

:::: {.columns style="width: 100%;" .fragment}

::: {.column width="50%"}
Content left
:::

::: {.column width="50%" style="text-align:right"}
Content right
:::

:::: 

:::: {.block .fragment}
Content after
::::

::::::
```

For images, use `fig-align="center"`
